component.name: POSE64
component.summary: Palm OS Emulator for modern Linux

description.p: POSE64 is a native 64-bit port of the Palm OS Emulator (POSE) 3.5, built with Qt6 for modern x86_64 Linux. It emulates Palm OS devices from the Pilot 1000 through the Palm m515, including DragonBall 328, EZ, and VZ processor variants.
Features include cycle-accurate timer emulation, device skins with per-pixel transparency, Gremlins automated testing, session save/restore, clipboard synchronization, and HiDPI support.
Initial public release. Native 64-bit Qt6 port of POSE 3.5.
